The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 28 August is 66,817 (7,701 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 August, there were 2,709 new confirmed cases (312.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 August, there were 2,466 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% (243 extra cases).
